footer.csclub: The University of Adelaide Computer Science Club

steps.search-course: Search for a course and press ‚ÄúAdd‚Äù to add the course to the timetable.
steps.calendar-dnd: Scroll down to see the calendar with your enrolled courses. You can drag a class and drop it in one of the highlighted boxes to change its time.
steps.change-week: Change the calendar week to see more classes.
steps.course-details: Click your enrolled course to see details of your enrolled classes.
steps.course-modal: If you encounter any class clashes when using MyTimetable, you can open the modal to change the class.
steps.access-adelaide: You can enrol for courses in Access Adelaide by using the class numbers, once you are happy with your class times.

toast.drop-to-change-term: You need to drop all courses to change the term
toast.too-many-courses: 8 courses for a term is crazy! üíÄ
